CustomField.description: Green: Okay Red: Check either "Out of the box" or "Customisation Required" fields
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"Yes"), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Mateo"), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Office__c, "San Carlos"))), OR(AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=FALSE,Customisation_Required__c=FALSE), AND(Out_of_the_box_Solution__c=TRUE,Customisation_Required__c=TRUE)) ), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Check either "Out of the box" or "Customisation Required" fields
CustomField.label: Check - Out of the box or Customisation?
